ascend_skill.desc:
After obtaining Justine & Caroline, during battle, increase Wonder's skill and Thief Tactics levels by 1 (takes effect even when Justine & Caroline are not in battle).
Before entering battle, Justine & Caroline can select 2 of their 4 sets of Personas, and their Skill 1 and Skill 2 will change accordingly. During battle, Justine & Caroline will receive the following role effect based on the selected sets:
Mask of Mischief & Innocence + Mask of Service & Admonition: Medic
Mask of Mischief & Innocence + Mask of Absurdity & Nonsense: Strategist
Mask of Mischief & Innocence + Mask of Luck & Loss: Sweeper
Mask of Service & Admonition + Mask of Absurdity & Nonsense: Guardian
Mask of Service & Admonition + Mask of Luck & Loss: Saboteur
Mask of Absurdity & Nonsense + Mask of Luck & Loss: Assassin
Skill effects are affected by Desire Level. At the start of battle, increase Desire Level by 25.
ascend_skill.name: Twin Wardens

ascend_skill.desc:
At the start of battle, depending on the selected Personas, gain 2 types of Facade.
At the start or end of Justine & Caroline's turn, if they have 2 types of Facade, automatically activate Two Masks as One on a random target 1 time (prioritizing the target of the previous skill attack used).
ascend_skill.name: Strict Tolerance

ascend_skill.desc:
When a Facade is gained, gain the following buff based on the type of Facade:
Facade of Mischief & Innocence: Increase party's Attack by 30% for 2 turns.
Facade of Service & Admonition: Decrease party's damage taken by 20% for 2 turns.
Facade of Absurdity & Nonsense: Increase critical damage of the Assassin or Sweeper ally with the highest Attack by 20% for 2 turns.
Facade of Luck & Loss: Increase Justine & Caroline's skill damage by 10% for 2 turns.
ascend_skill.name: Callous Kindness

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Selected Skill 1 and Two Masks as One by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Punitive Mercy

ascend_skill.desc: When Justine & Caroline activate their Highlight, increase their Attack by 40%, damage dealt by 20%, and grant 50% of these effects to other allies for 2 turns.
ascend_skill.name: Execution of Rebirth

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Selected Skill 2 and Thief Tactics by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Humane Prison

ascend_skill.desc:
When this Awareness is unlocked, during battle, increase Wonder's skill and Thief Tactics levels by 1 (takes effect even when Justine & Caroline are not in battle). Also, increase Desire Level by 20%.
At the start of battle, gain True Desire. Afterwards, regain True Desire every 8 turns if it has been spent.
During Justine & Caroline's turn, they can spend 1 True Desire stack to enhance the next activated Two Masks as One.
Enhanced effect: Activate all Facade effects for Two Masks as One. Also, deal bonus damage to the main target equal to 40% of Attack (8 hits. Increase this skill's effect by 1% for every 1 point of Desire Level. These bonus hits deal 1 hit of Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychokinesis, Nuclear, Bless, and Curse damage each.)
ascend_skill.name: Power to Resist Ruin

highlight_skill.desc:
When activating a Highlight, choose 1 of the 2 selected Persona sets and activate its Highlight below (cooldown times for each Highlight are calculated independently).
Mask of Mischief & Innocence: Increase the party's Attack by 24.4%/26.9%/25.9%/28.4% and damage by 34.2%/37.7%/36.3%/39.8% for 2 turns.
Mask of Service & Admonition: Restore the party's HP by 43.4%/47.9%/46.1%/50.6% of Justine & Caroline's Attack + 2782/3667/3419/4350.
Increase the party's max HP by 9.8%/10.8%/10.4%/11.4% for 2 turns.
Mask of Absurdity & Nonsense: Deal Psychokinesis damage to 1 foe equal to 244.0%/269.0%/259.0%/284.0% of Attack, and Nuclear damage equal to 244.0%/269.0%/259.0%/284.0% of Attack (1 hit each, can inflict critical damage).
Increase Attack by 34.2%/37.7%/36.3%/39.8% for Justine & Caroline and the ally with the highest Attack (prioritizing Assassins or Sweepers).
Mask of Luck & Loss: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 122.0%/134.5%/129.5%/142.0% of Attack, and deal Curse damage equal to 122.0%/134.5%/129.5%/142.0% of Attack (1 hit each, can inflict critical damage).
For 2 turns, increase Justine & Caroline's Attack by 29.3%/32.3%/31.1%/34.1% and critical damage by 19.5%/21.5%/20.7%/22.7%.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 74.5%/82.1%/79.0%/86.7% of Attack and Ice damage equal to 74.5%/82.1%/79.0%/86.7% of Attack (1 hit each; increase this effect by 1% for every 1 point of Desire Level). Also, increase party's Attack by 39.0%/43.0%/41.4%/45.4% for every 100 points of Desire Level for 3 turns.
Gain Facade of Mischief & Innocence.
normal_skill.name: Mask of Mischief & Innocence

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Electric damage to 1 foe equal to 74.5%/82.1%/79.0%/86.7% of Attack and Wind damage equal to 74.5%/82.1%/79.0%/86.7% of Attack (1 hit each; increase this effect by 1% for every 1 point of Desire Level). Also, decrease party's damage taken by 9.8%/10.8%/10.4%/11.4% and 9.8%/10.8%/10.4%/11.4% more for every 100 points of Desire Level for 3 turns. Also, restore party's HP by 34.7%/38.3%/36.9%/40.4% of Justine & Caroline's Attack + 2225/2934/2735/3480.
Gain Facade of Service & Admonition.
normal_skill.name: Mask of Service & Admonition

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Psychokinesis damage to 1 foe equal to 74.5%/82.1%/79.0%/86.7% of Attack and Nuclear damage equal to 74.5%/82.1%/79.0%/86.7% of Attack (1 hit each; increase this effect by 1% for every 1 point of Desire Level). Also, increase pierce rate for Justine & Caroline and the Sweeper or Assassin ally with the highest Attack by 4.9%/5.4%/5.2%/5.7% and 4.9%/5.4%/5.2%/5.7% more for every 100 points of Desire Level for 3 turns.
Gain Facade of Absurdity & Nonsense.
normal_skill.name: Mask of Absurdity & Nonsense

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to 74.5%/82.1%/79.0%/86.7% of Attack and Curse damage equal to 74.5%/82.1%/79.0%/86.7% of Attack (1 hit each; increase this effect by 1% for every point of Desire Level).
Also, increase Justine & Caroline's Attack by 14.6%/16.1%/15.5%/17.0% + 14.6%/16.1%/15.5%/17.0% for every 100 points of Desire Level, damage dealt by 9.8%/10.8%/10.4%/11.4% + 9.8%/10.8%/10.4%/11.4% for every 100 points of Desire Level, and critical rate by 4.9%/5.4%/5.2%/5.7% + 4.9%/5.4%/5.2%/5.7% for every 100 points of Desire Level for 3 turns.
Gain Facade of Luck & Loss.
normal_skill.name: Mask of Luck & Loss

normal_skill.desc:
Usable when any 2 types of Facade have been gained. Deal Almighty damage to 1 foe equal to 126.9%/139.9%/134.7%/147.7% of Attack (increase this effect by 1% for every 1 point of Desire Level). Also, spend all Facades to activate the following effects based on their combination.
Facade of Mischief & Innocence + Facade of Service & Admonition: Restore party's HP equal to 52.2%/57.6%/55.4%/60.8% of Attack + 3344/4409/4111/5230. Also, increase party's damage dealt by 43.9%/48.4%/46.6%/51.1% for every 100 points of Desire Level for 2 turns.
Facade of Mischief & Innocence + Facade of Absurdity & Nonsense: Grant other allies 14.6%/16.1%/15.5%/17.0% of Skill Amplification for 2 turns. Also, increase party's critical damage by 19.5%/21.5%/20.7%/22.7% for every 100 points of Desire Level.
Skill Amplification: Increase the values of skills and Thief Tactics that are increased when leveled up. This effect is calculated separately from other effects.
Facade of Mischief & Innocence + Facade of Luck & Loss: Change this skill's target to all foes.
Facade of Service & Admonition + Facade of Absurdity & Nonsense: Grant all allies a shield equal to 41.8%/46.1%/44.3%/48.6% of Justine & Caroline's Attack + 2675/3527/3289/4184 and 1 Down Point for 2 turns. Also, increase party's Defense by 48.8%/53.8%/51.8%/56.8% for every 100 points of Desire Level.
Facade of Service & Admonition + Facade of Luck & Loss: Inflict Shock, Windswept and 2 Curse stacks on the main target, and gain 2 Blessing stacks. These effects last for 2 turns. Also, decrease all foes' Defense by 25.4%/28.0%/26.9%/29.5% + 25.4%/28.0%/26.9%/29.5% for every 100 point of Desire Level for 2 turns.
Facade of Absurdity & Nonsense + Facade of Luck & Loss: This skill deals 1 more hit of Almighty damage. Also, gain Rebel Surveillance for 2 turns.
Rebel Surveillance: When using a skill, temporarily gain 4.9%/5.4%/5.2%/5.7% of Effects stats from the Sweeper or Assassin ally with the highest Attack (excluding Justine & Caroline).
normal_skill.name: Two Masks as One

passive_skill.desc:
At the start of battle, increase Desire Level based on Justine & Caroline's base stats.
For every 100 points of Attack, increase Desire Level by 1 (up to 45).
For every 2% of Damage Mult. +, increase Desire Level by 1 (up to 15).
For every 6% of Critical Multiplier above 100%, increase Desire Level by 1 (up to 15).
passive_skill.name: Overseer of Rehabilitation

passive_skill.desc:
Gain stat bonuses based on the selected Persona combinations:
Mask of Mischief & Innocence + Mask of Service & Admonition: Increase healing by 21.0%. Also, when on the field, increase party's damage dealt by 24.0%.
Mask of Mischief & Innocence + Mask of Absurdity & Nonsense: Increase Speed by 5. Also, when on the field, increase party's Attack by 30.0%.
Mask of Mischief & Innocence + Mask of Luck & Loss: Increase critical rate by 15.0%.
Mask of Service & Admonition + Mask of Absurdity & Nonsense: Increase Justine & Caroline's shield by 21.0%.
Mask of Service & Admonition + Mask of Luck & Loss: Increase Speed by 5. Also, when on the field, increase all foes' damage taken by 24.0%.
Mask of Absurdity & Nonsense + Mask of Luck & Loss: Increase critical damage by 30.0%.
passive_skill.name: Oxymoron
